newsitem.title: ROMANIA: Romanian Policolor had higher 1996 profit.
newsitem.headline: Romanian Policolor had higher 1996 profit.

text.p: Dividend per share - net 0.15 lei vs 2.03 lei

NOTE -- Policolor is a dye maker listed on the Bucharest stock exchange's second tier and one of the most heavily traded stock in this section. Data, reported to the bourse, are in nominal terms and in line with Romanian accounting standards. The company said in its report its share capital had increased last year from 1995 as the capital base expanded and part of the fixed assets had been revalued. ($=7,081 lei)
